channel.title: How to add models and npc's? help please
channel.description:
hi guys,
i am new to morpascape, i just made my server. the server and client is....20051104-server and rsprivservclient. i have no idea how to add npc's and models.
please help me
(if you cant tell me i will give u co-owner 2 my server ;D)
Thanks
Luke

item.title: How to add models and npc's? help please
item.dc:creator: @iScape0 iScape0
item.description:
@iScape0 wrote:

Im sure this guy is never going to post again, just coming for a fix and leave, that is why im not going to help…


[size=8pt]coughcough to add npcs goto your server and look for npc.java then add a npc. to add models go in your client.[/size]

If you can read it you can use it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add models and npc's? help please

item.title: How to add models and npc's? help please
item.dc:creator: @Halosham1 Halosham1
item.description:
@Halosham1 wrote:

Im not sure exactly if this will work because i cant log in to a moparscape server to create my own but, when you log into your moparscape server click on help and then go down and click on NPC IDs then it’ll show you a list of names and numbers and to add it go to your moparscape server and type in for example
::npc50
That is what you type in to get king black dragon
For another npc type in
::npc

then after you type in npc type in the number of the npc you want right next to it but there is no space between npc and the number but like i said im not sure if this will work…I hope this helps ^.^

Read full topic
item.source: How to add models and npc's? help please
